snippet: Justin Trudeau, 41, the son of Pierre Elliott Trudeau, who was prime minister for 15 years, is faced with reviving a party that is no longer dominant in federal politics.
abstract: Justin Trudeau, son of Canada's former prime minister, Pierre Elliott Trudeau, is elected leader of embattled Liberal Party of Canada; is now faced with reviving party that is no longer dominant in Canadian federal politics.
lead_paragraph: Justin Trudeau, 41, the son of Pierre Elliott Trudeau, who was prime minister for 15 years, is faced with reviving a party that is no longer dominant in federal politics.

headline.seo: Justin Trudeau Elected Leader of Liberal Party of Canada
headline.main: A Trudeau Again Leads Canada Party
headline.print_headline: A Trudeau Again Leads Canada Party
